long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services offers a fleet that consists of a wide variety of models and manufacturers.  Whether it is a standard or customized vehicle, such as a Cadillac Escalade, we offer a rental vehicle for any of your needs.

short_description:
• Toyota Prius or similar
• Automatic Transmission
• Eco-friendly
• Fuel Efficient
• 48 miles per gallon
• 0 CO2 emissions
• Dual Airbags
• Seats 5
long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services supplies fuel-efficient vehicles, such as hybrid cars/SUVs and electric vehicles, for movie productions, sporting events and everything in between.  Partnered with one of the world’s largest car rental companies, we are uniquely positioned to provide customers with first hand experience driving clean-technology vehicles that are energy-efficient and low-emission.  Our goal is to help make smart, sustainable mobility a viable, global reality by giving customers and communities access to, and the experience of, driving greener rentals.

short_description:
• 15’ and 24’ Models available
• Liftgates
• Jockey Boxes
long_description: Looking to move or transport a large amount of material?  Hertz Entertainment Services offers Cube Panel Trucks for rent in multiple sizes.   With 15' and 24' models available, we have the box truck to meet your needs.

short_description:
• Crew Cab - 12’ to 22’
• Regular Cab - 12' to 22'
• Liftgates (Standard)
• Tow Packages (Standard)
long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services carries various Stake Bed Trucks for rent.  With models ranging from 12' to 22', these units are ideal for multiple types of applications, where you need to transport materials from location to location.

long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services offers a fleet  of vehicles that consists of a wide variety of models and manufacturers.  Whether it is a Minivan for personal use or to move people from one place to another, we offer a rental vehicle for any of your needs.

short_description:

• Automatic Transmission
• Air Conditioning
• 16 miles/gallon
• 0 CO2 emissions
• Running Boards
• Back-Up Camera Option

• DVD Package available
• Seats 15
long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services offers the ever so popular Ford E-350 Passenger Van for rent.  Whether it's accommodating up to 15 passengers, carrying an impressive amount of cargo or towing up to 10,000 lbs., this passenger van has the capabilities to perform multiple tasks.

short_description:
• 2,000 – 4,000 Gallon Capacities available
• Remote Control Water Cannons available
long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services carries water trucks for rent that carry water in sizes from 2,000 gallons up to 4,000 gallons for a variety of reasons.   Whether your working on a construction site keeping dirt and dust from billowing everywhere or providing a water prop for your movie production, these water trucks will serve you in the manner required.

short_description:
• Hertz Dream Cars™
• Over 39 Locations in 23 States
• Dream Service = Premier Customer Service
• Hertz Executive Client Concierge
• Fully Detailed Vehicles
• Delivery To & From Your Location
• Luxury Rental Fleet
long_description: Hertz Entertainment Services offers the ability to rent the world's most elite Exotics, SUVs, Performance and Luxury cars.  Our line of Hertz Dream Cars™ include: Aston Martin, Audi, BMW, Cadillac, Ferrari, Jaguar, Lamborghini, Land Rover, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Viper and Tesla models. This stunning selection is available for rent at select locations across the United States. For more information and to make a reservation, please visit www.HertzDreamCars.com.
